stepAnswer: Data from .csv, .txt, .tsv, and .xlsx files can all be imported into spreadsheets.
stepTitle: Which of the following statements about importing data into spreadsheets is true?
choices: Data can only be imported from other spreadsheet files, such as .xlsx files
To import data into a spreadsheet, navigate to File > Open.
When importing data, you have to create a new spreadsheet.
Data from .csv, .txt, .tsv, and .xlsx files can all be imported into spreadsheets.
